statements: SELECT customer_id, customer_name, preference_category, preference_value FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, preference_category, preference_value FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_category = 'Food' ORDER BY customer_name ASC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_value LIKE '%Italian%' AND preference_category = 'Cuisine';
SELECT preference_category, COUNT(*) AS preference_count FROM customer_preferences GROUP BY preference_category ORDER BY preference_count DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, preference_category, preference_value FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_name = 'John'
SELECT customer_name, preference_category, preference_value FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY preference_category ASC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) AS total_customers FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_category = 'Food'
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_preferences FROM customer_preferences GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_preferences DESC
SELECT customer_id, preference_category, preference_value FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_value LIKE '%Vegetarian%'
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, age FROM customer_preferences WHERE age > 30;
SELECT preference_category, preference_details FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_category = 'Sports';
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_strategies WHERE strategy_status = 'Active';
SELECT strategy_id, supplier_id, strategy_description FROM supply_chain_strategies WHERE strategy_id <= 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, preference_category FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_category = 'Technology' AND age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT count(customer_id) AS total_customers, preference_category FROM customer_preferences GROUP BY preference_category HAVING total_customers > 2 ORDER BY total_customers DESC;
SELECT c.name, s.strategy_type FROM customer_preferences c JOIN supply_chain_strategies s ON c.customer_id = s.supplier_id WHERE c.age > 30 AND s.strategy_status = 'Active';
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age, MIN(age) AS min_age, AVG(age) AS avg_age, preference_category FROM customer_preferences GROUP BY preference_category HAVING avg_age > 35 ORDER BY max_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, preference_1, preference_2 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM OrderHistory ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM OrderHistory WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name FROM SupplyChainStrategies WHERE strategy_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_1 = 'discount';
SELECT * FROM OrderHistory ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM OrderHistory WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM SupplyChainStrategies WHERE strategy_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_profiles WHERE preference1 = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name FROM supply_chain_strategies WHERE LENGTH(strategy_description) > 50;
SELECT purchase_id, total_amount, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_profiles WHERE preference1 > 5 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases JOIN customer_profiles ON purchases.customer_id = customer_profiles.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM supply_chain_strategies WHERE LENGTH(strategy_description) > 50;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT preference_category, preference_value FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM ProductInventory ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%USA%';
SELECT product_id, supply_date FROM SupplyChain WHERE product_id = 3 ORDER BY supply_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, preference_category FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_category = 'Food';
SELECT p.product_name, s.supplier_name FROM ProductInventory p JOIN Suppliers s ON p.product_id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT DISTINCT preference_category FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT ph.customer_id, pi.product_name, ph.purchase_date FROM PurchaseHistory ph JOIN ProductInventory pi ON ph.product_id = pi.product_id ORDER BY ph.purchase_date DESC;
